      • playSound

        public static void playSound​(com.badlogic.gdx.audio.Sound sound)
        Plays a sound with the global volume. Won't play if the game is muted.
        Parameters:
        sound - the sound to play

      • playSound

        public static void playSound​(com.badlogic.gdx.audio.Sound sound,
                             float volume)
        Plays a sound with the global volume multiplied by a specific volume. Won't play if the game is muted.
        Parameters:
        sound - the sound to play
        volume - the volume to play the sound at
